v2.headline: Helping solo founders build thriving businesses with AI | Community & Implementation | Founder @ Mode Lab & Mighty AI Lab
v2.about:
I help solo founders and small teams do more with less using AI.

How I can help you: 
• Run your business more efficiently with fewer resources
• Serve more clients without burning out 
• Focus on what you do best while AI handles the rest 
• Build systems that get better over time, not more complicated

With 24+ years experience transforming how growth-stage businesses innovate and a focus on practical results, I guide business owners to achieve more without traditional resource constraints.

Real Results I've Helped Create: 
• Cut routine tasks by 70-80% 
• Serve 3-4X more clients without adding staff 
• Reduce operational costs by 50-60% 
• Free up 45%+ more time for strategic growth 
• Compete with much larger companies while staying small

If you want to build a business that works smarter (not just harder), I can help you in two ways:

MIGHTY AI LAB COMMUNITY
Join solo founders and small business leaders learning to use AI to grow without the growing pains.

→ JOIN HERE: https://mightyailab.com

MODE LAB CONSULTING
Get personalized help implementing AI in your business, from initial strategy to ongoing support.

→ BOOK A CALL: https://calendly.com/mode-lab/impact-consultation
